name: Monorail
description:
This is my first Ludum Dare entry, I hope you'll enjoy my game :) !

This is a mix between snake and pacman : you have to go to each place marked with a yellow square to go to the next level !

Every ten squares you get, the speed increases by 15%. Try to avoid accidents ;)

HOW TO PLAY : you just have to click on the switches to guide your monorail.

You have a death count at the top of the screen, it would be cool if everyone give the number they get at the end of the game :D ! (there's 4 maps)

I wanted to create a level editor and fancy shaders, but didn't have the time... however, it's really easy to create new map if you check the data folder where all the maps are.
